revised_title: Tables of Second Virial and Low-Pressure Joule-Thomson Coefficients for Intermolecular Potentials with Exponential Repulsion: A Review
tldr: This article presents tables of second virial and low-pressure Joule-Thomson coefficients for intermolecular potentials with exponential repulsion. The authors compute these coefficients for a potential derived from the Lennard-Jones potential by replacing the inverse-power repulsion with an exponential term. The tables cover a range of parameters and temperatures, and the results can be applied to various substances.
